languages.text: "Это не совсем верно, {name}. Если, конечно, твоей интенцией не является избавление от конкурента". {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "В мое тело вживлены аугменты, сканирующие состояние внутренних органов и полученные повреждения. Лекари на "Обете Императора" уже знают, где я и что со мной. Отряд спасения скоро прибудет, и хирургеоны со временем залечат мои раны".

traits.locale_text: "Это не совсем верно, {name}. Если, конечно, твоей интенцией не является избавление от конкурента". {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "В мое тело вживлены аугменты, сканирующие состояние внутренних органов и полученные повреждения. Лекари на "Обете Императора" уже знают, где я и что со мной. Отряд спасения скоро прибудет, и хирургеоны со временем залечат мои раны".

languages.text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."
languages.original_text: "Это не совсем верно, {name}. Если, конечно, твоей интенцией не является избавление от конкурента". {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "В мое тело вживлены аугменты, сканирующие состояние внутренних органов и полученные повреждения. Лекари на "Обете Императора" уже знают, где я и что со мной. Отряд спасения скоро прибудет, и хирургеоны со временем залечат мои раны".

traits.locale_text: "That is not exactly right, {name}. If, of course, your intention isn't to get rid of your rival." {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of the internal organs and the injuries sustained. The healers on 'Emperor's Vow' already know where I am and what is wrong with me. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds over time."

"That is not exactly right, {name}. If, of course, your intention isn't to get rid of your rival." {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of the internal organs and the injuries sustained. The healers on 'Emperor's Vow' already know where I am and what is wrong with me. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds over time."

The healers on 'Emperor's Vow' already know where I am and what is wrong with me. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds over time."

The healers on 'Emperor's Vow' already know where I am and what is wrong with me. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds over time."

"Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

"Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

languages.text: «La misericordia no parece ser aplicable, {name}. A menos, claro está, que pretenda deshacerse de su rival, claro está». {n}El comentario de Winterscale es mitad burla y mitad provocación.{/n} «Mi cuerpo tiene instaladas modificaciones auméticas que monitorizan el estado de mis órganos internos y de las heridas que sufro. El Voto del Emperador ya sabe dónde estoy y qué me pasa. El equipo de rescate llegará pronto, y con el tiempo los cirujanos tratarán mis heridas».
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no es del todo cierto, {name}. A menos que pretenda deshacerse de su rival, claro está». {n}El comentario de Winterscale es claramente una pulla contra ti.{/n} «Mi cuerpo tiene instaladas modificaciones auméticas que monitorizan el estado de mis órganos internos y de las heridas que sufro. Los sanadores del "Voto del Emperador" ya saben dónde estoy y qué me pasa. El equipo de rescate llegará pronto, y con el tiempo los quirurgos restañarán mis heridas».

languages.text: “‘仁慈’这个词恐怕未必准确，{name}。当然，除非你就是打算借着这个机会除掉你的竞争对手。”{n}温特斯凯尔以挑衅的语气开了口。{/n}“我的体内安装了植入物，可以跟踪记录内脏的状况与身体伤害。帝皇誓约号上的医师已经知道我在哪里，也明白了这里的状况。救援队很快就会来，而船医会慢慢治愈我的伤口。”
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

traits.locale_text: “这句话并不完全正确，{name}。当然，前提是，你没打算借着这个机会除掉你的竞争对手。”{n}温特斯凯尔着重强调道，显然意有所指。{/n}“我的体内安装了植入物，可以跟踪记录内脏的状况与受到的伤害。帝皇誓约号上的医师已经知道我在哪里，出了什么问题。救援队很快就会来，而船医会慢慢治愈我的伤口。”

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas tout à fait exact, {name}. Du moins, si vous n'avez pas simplement l'intention de vous débarrasser d'un rival gênant, {n}remarque Winterscale continue sur un ton provocateur.{/n} Sachez que mon corps est équipé d'augmétiques qui permettent de suivre à distance l'état de mes organes internes et blessures. Le Serment de l'Empereur sait où je me trouve et dans quel état je suis. L'équipe de secours ne va pas tarder à arriver et les chirurgeons guériront mes blessures. »
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas tout à fait exact, {name}. Du moins, si vous n'avez pas simplement l'intention de vous débarrasser d'un rival gênant, » {n}rétorque Winterscale sur un ton sarcastique.{/n} Sachez que mon corps est équipé d'augmétiques qui permettent de suivre à distance l'état de mes organes internes et des blessures subies. Les médecins du Serment de l'Empereur savent où je me trouve et ce qui m'est arrivé. L'équipe de secours ne va pas tarder à arriver et les chirurgiens guériront mes blessures. »

languages.text: 「情けは人の為ならずだぞ、{name}。もちろん、お前の意図がライバルを排除することでないのならな」{n}ウィンタースケールは、煽るような口調で言った。{/n}「俺の体には、内臓の状態や負った傷を追跡するオーグメティックが取り付けられている。『皇帝の誓い』は、俺がどこにいて、どんな状態なのかを知っている。救急部隊はすぐに到着するし、チラ－ジョンが時間をかけて俺の傷を治してくれる」
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

traits.locale_text: 「情けは人の為ならずだぞ、{name}。もちろん、お前の意図がライバルを排除することでないのならな」{n}ウィンタースケールは、煽るような口調で言った。{/n}「俺の体には、内臓の状態や負った傷を追跡するオーグメティックが取り付けられている。『皇帝の誓い』は、俺がどこにいて、どんな状態なのかを知っている。救急部隊はすぐに到着するし、チラ－ジョンが時間をかけて俺の傷を治してくれる」

languages.text: "Gnade ist vielleicht nicht anwendbar, {name}. Wenn Eure Absicht nicht darin besteht, Euren Rivalen loszuwerden, versteht sich", {n}merkt Winterzunder provokant an.{/n} "In meinem Körper sind Augmentationen installiert, die ständig den Zustand meiner inneren Organe und eventuelle Verletzungen überwachen. Die Heiler auf der Eid des Imperators wissen bereits, wo ich bin und in welchem Zustand ich mich befinde. Der Rettungstrupp wird bald hier sein, und der Chirurgeum wird meine Wunden mit der Zeit heilen."
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."

traits.locale_text: "Das stimmt so nicht ganz, {name}. Wenn Eure Absicht nicht darin besteht, Euren Rivalen loszuwerden, versteht sich"{n}, bemerkt Winterzunder spitzzüngig.{/n} "In meinem Körper sind Augmentationen installiert, die ständig den Zustand der inneren Organe und der erlittenen Verletzungen überwachen. Die Heiler auf der Eid des Imperators wissen bereits, wo ich bin und was mir fehlt. Der Rettungstrupp wird bald hier sein, und der Chirurgeum wird meine Wunden mit der Zeit heilen."

languages.text: "Merhamet, bu durumda tam olarak geçerli sayılmaz {name}. Tabii ki niyetin bir rakipten kurtulmak değilse." {n}Winterscale, teşvik edici bir ses tonuyla yorum yapıyor.{/n} Bedenimde iç organlarımın durumunu ve zedelenmelerimi takip eden ogmetikler kurulu. İmparator'un Andı, zaten nerede ve ne durumda olduğumu biliyor. Kurtarma mangası kısa süre içinde gelir, cerrahlar da zamanla yaralarımı iyileştirirler."
languages.original_text: "Mercy may not be exactly applicable, {name}. Unless, of course, your intention is to get rid of a rival." {n}Winterscale remarks in a goading tone.{/n} "My body has augmetics installed that track the condition of my internal organs and injuries. The Emperor's Vow already knows where I am and what state I am in. The rescue squad will arrive soon, and the chirurgeons will heal my wounds in time."
